{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Portable Wireless AP Storage |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = AMIT_MGB100 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = AMIT |model = MGB100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = |type = NAS,access point |sernum = |fcc_id = PBLMGB100 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = AMRISC;20000; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = i386 |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320A; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16160; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0,IDE (2.5") |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_ide_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = OEM |fccapprovdate = 11/30/2005 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2560; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;; |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://tintuc.no-ip.com/linux/tipps/mgb100/ Hacking MGB100]
Above link states the item was sold as.. *Level-One (WAP-0007) *Comet Labs (MGB100) *Conceptronic (CHD2WLANU) *Micronica (MGB100) *OvisLink (WMU-6000FS) *Safecom (SWSAPUR-5400) *SMC (SMCWAPS-G EU) *Pearl (PE6643) The device uses a IT8211F IDE controller. Mentioned in [https://openwrt.org/logs/openwrt.log.20060523 this OpenWrt chat log] (aka Pearl ConnecTec PE6643?) FCC manual shows the device with an IP of 192.168.123.254, OUI of 00:50:18 (also on FCC EUT's board MAC label), and SSID of MGB100. [[Category:English Documentation]]
